title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message:
First was 3 usb ports acting 5v 200mah and 1 port only 5v 36mah, i changed 2 usb controllers one side and now 4 acting 5v 200mah, without battery connected. When i connect battery after first try ports same 5v 200mah but second try with battery 20v 0.63mah steady. 

ppbus 12.30 cycling to 10-11, like trying to get 12.60

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message:
Some people reported on Internet to have problems aquiring good CD3217 chips for this model.
Seems that doesn't accept any chip, like other models.

Are you using 96/140W charger?
Any history fault available?
What voltage do you get on the coils, with both charger and battery connected?

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message: Now its booting and working, but something is wrong with left side because no usb activity, but right side is working and not charging

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message:
Machine works with charger connected on left side too?
Just no USB activity there (J3300)?

Check C3506/3298 voltage, when connect an USB device (not charger) on that side.

USB-C metter switches to 20V on all ports, without battery connected?

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message: usb c meter not switching to 20v without battery, when battery connected 20v 36mah, without battery 5v 230-250mah. board boots fine and working but no charging and left side activity

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message:
Which CD3127 chips did you change, left side?

96W charger for sure?

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message: 96w charger yes. left side cd3127 i changed.

title: A2141 820-01700 strange power issue
message:
Did you check mentioned voltage, when connect USB device on left side?
That voltage comes from L3500.

All ports stuck in 5V without battery, or just left side?
